export{};/**
 * Extended functions for React
 */ //// --------------------- ///
Array.prototype.isEmpty=function(){return this.length==0;};Array.prototype.insert=function(index,item){this.splice(index,0,item);};Array.prototype.serialized=function(){var min=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:false;if(min)return this.map(function(obj){return obj.serializeMin();});return this.map(function(obj){return obj.serialize();});};Array.prototype.remove=function(element){var index=this.indexOf(element);if(index>-1){this.splice(index,1);return true;}return false;};Array.prototype.last=function(){if(this.length>0){return this[this.length-1];}return null;};Array.prototype.first=function(){if(this.length>0){return this[0];}return null;};Date.prototype.addSeconds=function(seconds){var myTimeSpan=seconds*1000;this.setTime(this.getTime()+myTimeSpan);return this;};/**
 * String functions
 */String.prototype.truncate=function(strLen,separator){if(this.length<=strLen)return""+this;separator=separator||'...';var sepLen=separator.length,charsToShow=strLen-sepLen,frontChars=Math.ceil(charsToShow/2),backChars=Math.floor(charsToShow/2);return this.substr(0,frontChars)+separator+this.substr(this.length-backChars);};
